TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowApplicationIdleEventArgs extends System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationEventArgs

summary.span: 保存有关进入空闲状态的工作流实例的信息。

span.span: Holds information about the workflow instance that has become idle.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查传递给 实例的 处理程序的 。The following code example inspects the passed into the handler of a instance. 在此示例中，进入空闲状态的工作流包含一个由名为 的活动所拥有的名为 `EnterGuess` 的 `ReadInt`。In this example the workflow going idle has one with a name of `EnterGuess`, owned by an activity named `ReadInt`. 基于此代码示例[如何： 运行工作流](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/how-to-run-a-workflow.md)，这是属于[入门教程[.NET Framework 4.5]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial.md)。This code example is based off of [How to: Run a Workflow](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/how-to-run-a-workflow.md), which is part of the [Getting Started Tutorial [.NET Framework 4.5]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial.md). 如果修改了该阶段中的 处理程序以包含此示例中的代码，则将显示以下输出。If the handler in that step is modified to contain the code from this example, the following output is displayed. ```Output BookmarkName: EnterGuess - OwnerDisplayName: ReadInt ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Bookmarks As ReadOnlyCollection(Of BookmarkInfo)

summary.span: 获取工作流实例的书签的只读集合。

span.span: Gets the read-only collection of bookmarks for the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查传递给 实例的 处理程序的 。The following code example inspects the passed into the handler of a instance. 在此示例中，进入空闲状态的工作流包含一个由名为 的活动所拥有的名为 `EnterGuess` 的 `ReadInt`。In this example the workflow going idle has one with a name of `EnterGuess`, owned by an activity named `ReadInt`. 基于此代码示例[如何： 运行工作流](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/how-to-run-a-workflow.md)，这是属于[入门教程[.NET Framework 4.5]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial.md)。This code example is based off of [How to: Run a Workflow](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/how-to-run-a-workflow.md), which is part of the [Getting Started Tutorial [.NET Framework 4.5]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/getting-started-tutorial.md). 如果修改了该阶段中的 处理程序以包含此示例中的代码，则将显示以下输出。If the handler in that step is modified to contain the code from this example, the following output is displayed. ```Output BookmarkName: EnterGuess - OwnerDisplayName: ReadInt ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowApplicationExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowapplicationexample/cs/program.cs#2)]
